scripts.dump-fonts: for FILE in fonts/*.otf; do otfccdump $FILE --pretty --ignore-hints --ignore-glyph-order --hex-cmap -o ${FILE//.otf/.json}; done
scripts.sample-fonts: for FILE in fonts/SourceHanSansSC/SourceHanSansSC-*.json; do node scripts/sample.js $FILE ${FILE//'fonts/SourceHanSansSC'/'samples'}; done
scripts.samples2model: for FILE in samples/*.json; do python -m scripts.glyph_model_convert $FILE ${FILE//.json/.model.json}; done
